1418600659163680770.text: Finally, this legislation looks out for our service members and their families, with landmark strides to combat sexual assault and provide paid leave for our servicemembers.

1418600656697450499.text: Third, we created a microelectronics research and development network, which will benefit Arizona’s growing microchip industry and leading universities like @ASU.

1418600655430856706.text: Second, we authorized five military construction projects in Arizona: two at @LukeAFB for F-35 facilities, one at @DMAFB for the South Wilmot gate, and two at @Yuma_MCAS to upgrade housing and training for our troops.

1418600654159892481.text: First, we blocked plans to retire the A-10 Warthog. @DMAFB is home to the largest contingent of A-10s, and these planes cannot be retired without a replacement to carry out the close air support mission for our troops.
